summary: A man and his wife find themselves stranded in a small western town. He discovers that a strange force has turned the residents into zombies, and runs into a beautiful woman who he believes is the key to the mystery.
cast: James Franciscus|Lee Grant|Scott Marlowe|Andrew Prine|Tisha Sterling|Leslie Nielsen|Morris Buchanan|John Kellogg|Virginia Vincent|Cliff Carnell|Victor Izay|Raymond Mayo|Russell Thorson|Nancy Valentine|Elisha Cook Jr.|Sharon Gless|William Sargent
title: Pueblo de fantasmas
